panels.description: Status codes returned by the server
panels.title: Status Codes

targets.expr:
sum by(method, handler) (rate(microbus_server_request_duration_seconds_count{port!="888", error="ERROR", code=~"^5..$", service="$service"}[$interval]))
/
sum by(method, handler) (rate(microbus_server_request_duration_seconds_count{port!="888", service="$service"}[$interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, method, handler) (rate(microbus_server_request_duration_seconds_bucket{port!="888", service="$service"}[$interval])))
60 * sum by(code, method, handler) (rate(microbus_server_request_duration_seconds_count{port!="888", error="ERROR", service="$service"}[$interval])) != 0
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, method, handler) (rate(microbus_server_response_body_bytes_bucket{port!="888", service="$service"}[$interval])))
